title: Provided further that, on surrender of tenancy by MCGM/Appropriate Authority in a private existing amenity plot, the existing amenity on the said plot shall be deemed to be lapsed
clause_text: Provided further that, on surrender of tenancy by MCGM/Appropriate Authority in a private existing amenity plot, the existing amenity on the said plot shall be deemed to be lapsed.
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided further that, on surrender of tenancy by MCGM/Appropriate Authority in a private existing amenity plot, the existing amenity on the said plot shall be deemed to be lapsed.
